description: Applies a simple 3D sharpening filter to the positive values in the #0 volume of the input dataset, and writes out a new dataset.

sharpening_factor.title: Sharpening factor
sharpening_factor.description: Sharpening factor, between 0.1 and 0.9 (inclusive). Larger values mean more sharpening.

output_prefix.title: Output prefix
output_prefix.description: Name of the output dataset (e.g., output.nii.gz) which will be in floating point format.
